JobTitle: Tax Global Employer Services Employment Tax Senior
JobFullDesc: Are you a strategic thinker who can integrate your tax knowledge and business experience to advise on the design, delivery and taxation of employee compensation? Are you fascinated by the regulatory landscape and business environments in which global clients operate around the world? If you said "Yes!" and this is your passion, we have the perfect career for you!The Employment Tax practice at Deloitte Tax LLP helps clients understand and manage the complexities of their US and global employment tax obligations - i.e. taxing and reporting compensation delivered to employees, executives, expatriates, non-employee directors, independent contractors, agency workers and more. We provide technical advice and strategic guidance to all types of organization - from public to private sector (listed and non-listed) and are privileged to serve some of the largest employers in the world.What you'll doAs a GES Employment Tax Senior, you will:Work on a wide range of client engagements and perform research, write technical advice, project management and compliance activities whilst exceeding expectations.Support employment tax due diligence, advisory, planning and compliance services.Identify engagement opportunities and coordinate with engagement leadership to deliver the breadth of Global Employer Services to the client.Support the development and marketing of new services to clients and targetsSupervise staff members in the performance of engagement deliverables and support them in their career development.Collaborate with client engagement leaders to address budgeting, billing and engagement administration.The TeamAs an Employment Tax Manager, you will be part of the Global Employer Services ("GES") team. Our GES tax consultants help clients develop tax-aligned compensation and benefits programs that address their international and domestic needs. Our consultants come from global mobility, compensation and benefits backgrounds and work with clients to streamline business operations while managing the scalability, risks, and costs of programs.
